reviewText: Great player, a Great guy but if you expect in detail to learn the right hand Bati technique will be disappointed as me.

MAB though overlooked b/c of the speed he plays at is so under rated due to  pedestrian ears. Sure he plays fast, but is so damn accurate and his intonation is superb. Had he not been found in the 80's he would of and should be viewed as a virtuoso of the instrument. There is so much to learn from his instruction. will be viewed over and over.
